 I think the formula should be:

 unbiased: 1/sqrt(n)
 biased: sqrt(n-1)/n

 You can verify this numerically

 N = 7
 eps = 1e-9
 x = torch.zeros(N, dtype=torch.double)
 x[0] = eps
 print(float(torch.std(x) / eps))
 print(float(1/math.sqrt(N)))
